game.name: Mom Stolen in Space
game.shortDescription: Play as Sora, a boy stranded in an abandoned space colony. Explore collapsed passages, solve puzzles, and uncover clues while trying to reunite with his mother Mitsuki and friend Tarou. Together, they must find a way home. Can they escape before another disaster strikes?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Sora, a boy stranded in an abandoned space colony. Explore collapsed passages, solve puzzles, and uncover clues while trying to reunite with his mother Mitsuki and friend Tarou. Together, they must find a way home. Can they escape before another disaster strikes?
